meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>extent</kanji> <kanji>degree</kanji>s show to what <vocabulary>degree</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>extent</vocabulary> you're willing to take something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
